trans-unit.source: Annotates the returned result of a user-defined type (UDT) with additional information that can be used in Transact-SQL.
trans-unit.target: Annotates returnerte resultatet av en brukerdefinert type (UDT) med ekstra informasjon som kan brukes i Transact-SQL.

trans-unit.source: SqlFacetAttribute may only be specified on non-void return values.
trans-unit.target: SqlFacetAttribute kan bare angis på ikke-void returverdier.

trans-unit.source: SqlFacetAttribute is used only to derive information about the return type, and is not intended to be a constraint specification on what can be stored in the type.
trans-unit.target: SqlFacetAttribute brukes bare for å få informasjon om Returtypen og skal ikke være en begrensning spesifikasjon på hva kan lagres i typen.

trans-unit.source: Thus, if a field has a SqlFacetAttribute indicating its size to be 2 characters, then the SQL Server type of the field access expression is of size 2, but assignments into the field are not restricted by this facet.
trans-unit.target: Gir en SqlFacetAttribute som angir størrelsen skal 2 tegn, derfor deretter SQL Server felt tilgang uttrykk er størrelsen 2, men tildelinger i feltet er ikke begrenset av fasetten denne til.

trans-unit.source: The table below captures the matrix of valid values for the various properties for specific field types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor registrerer matrisen for gyldige verdier for egenskapene forskjellige for bestemte typer.

trans-unit.source: In this table, "Y" indicates that the property is valid, and "N" indicates that the property is not valid.
trans-unit.target: I denne tabellen indikerer "Y" at egenskapen er gyldig, og "N" indikerer egenskapen ikke er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: The specified SqlFacetAttribute must be compatible with the field type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte SqlFacetAttribute må være kompatibel med felttypen.

trans-unit.source: If the property is not valid, type registration will report an error if the user specifies a non-default value for the property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ikke er gyldig, rapportere type registrering en feil hvis brukeren angir en ikke-standard verdi for egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum values for <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A> properties are 38.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt verdier for <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>og <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A>er 38.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A> </xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A> property, the value should be in the range of 1-8000 for binary and non-Unicode data, 1-4000 for Unicode data, or -1.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>egenskapen verdien må være i området 1-8000 for binær og ikke-Unicode-data, 1-4000 Unicode-data, eller -1.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other values are not valid.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre verdier er ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: |Type|IsFixedLength|MaxSize|Precision|Scale|IsNullable| |----------|-------------------|-------------|---------------|-----------|----------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal>|N|N|Y|Y|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlChars>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |Embedded UDTs|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.String>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |Byte[]|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |Char[]|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.DateTime>|N|N|N|Y<sup>1</sup>|N| |<xref:System.Decimal>|N|N|Y|Y|Y| (1) Specifying the scale on a DateTime type will cause the value to be returned to Transact-SQL as a DateTime2 type with the specified scale.
trans-unit.target: | Typen | IsFixedLength | MaxSize | Presisjonen | Skalaen | IsNullable | |----------|-------------------|-------------|---------------|-----------|----------------| | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal>| N | N | Y | Y | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>| Y | Y | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>| Y | Y | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>| N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>| Y | Y | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlChars>| Y | Y | N | N | Y | | Innebygde UDTs | N | N | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.String>| Y | Y | N | N | Y | | Byte [] | Y | Y | N | N | Y | | CHAR [] | Y | Y | N | N | Y | | <xref:System.DateTime>| N | N | N | Y<sup>1</sup>| N | | <xref:System.Decimal>| N | N | Y | Y | Y | (1) ved å angi skalaen for en DateTime-type, vil det føre til at verdien som returneres til Transact-SQL som en DateTime2 type med angitt skalering.</xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlChars> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>

trans-unit.source: An optional attribute on a user-defined type (UDT) return type, used to annotate the returned result with additional information that can be used in Transact-SQL.
trans-unit.target: En valgfri attributt for en brukerdefinert type (UDT) returtype, brukes til å legge til merknader i det returnerte resultatet med ekstra informasjon som kan brukes i Transact-SQL.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the return type of the user-defined type is of a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: Angir om Returtypen for brukerdefinert type med en fast lengde.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set to `false` if the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A> property is set to 1.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må settes til `false` hvis den <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>egenskapen er satt til 1.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the return type is of a fixed length; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Returtypen er av en fast lengde. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the return type of the user-defined type can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir om Returtypen for brukerdefinert type kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the return type of the user-defined type can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Returtypen for brukerdefinert type kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in logical units, of the underlying field type of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale størrelsen, i logiske enheter av felttypen underliggende av en brukerdefinert type.

trans-unit.source: Logical unit is bytes (with a maximum size of 8000) for the binary and non-Unicode data types, and the number of Unicode characters (with a maximum size of 4000) for the character field types.
trans-unit.target: Logisk enhet er byte (med en maksimal størrelse på 8000) for den binære filen og ikke-Unicode-datatyper og antall Unicode-tegn (med en maksimal størrelse på 4000) for de tegn typene.

trans-unit.source: The value -1 is reserved for large character and binary types.
trans-unit.target: Verdien -1 er reservert for stor bokstav og binære typer.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4000 for Unicode character types and 8000 for binary and non-Unicode types.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 4000 for typen for Unicode-tegn og 8000 for binær og ikke-Unicode.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the maximum size, in logical units, of the underlying field type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer den maksimale størrelsen, i logiske enheter, underliggende felttypen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The precision of the return type of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: Presisjonen for Returtypen for brukerdefinert type.

trans-unit.source: The Precision property is valid only for numeric types.
trans-unit.target: Presisjonen-egenskapen er bare gyldig for numeriske typer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A> property must also be specified when setting the Precision property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A>må også være angitt når du angir presisjonen-egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the Precision property is 38; the default value is 38.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale verdien for egenskapen Precision er 38; Standardverdien er 38.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the precision of the return type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer presisjonen for Returtypen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The scale of the return type of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: Skalaen for Returtypen for brukerdefinert type.

trans-unit.source: The Scale property is valid only for decimal types.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen skalaen er bare gyldig for decimal typer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A> property must also be specified when setting the Scale property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>egenskapen må også angis ved angivelse av egenskapen Scale.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the Scale property is 38; the default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale verdien for egenskapen skalaen er 38; Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the scale of the return type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer skalaen for Returtypen.</xref:System.Int32>
